Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Clark
ShortDescription: 72 North buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Avenue buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/72nd
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 71st, Morgan, 74th & Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 71st, Morgan, 74th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.
